title: About ORINIUM
description1: ORINIUM is a student-led research and development startup focused on advancing robotics, artificial intelligence, and autonomous systems. Founded in 2022 at Y覺ld覺z Technical University, we combine academic excellence with practical innovation.
description2: Our mission is to develop cutting-edge solutions that push the boundaries of what's possible in autonomous systems, from ground vehicles to intelligent control systems.
